job.title: Sr. AWS Data Engineer/ Developer
job.description:
AWS Date Engineer/Developer
Contract to hire
Irving, TX (remote position)

Responsibilities

Design and support the new and evolving sources of data being brought into the data warehouse.

Requiremetns

At least 9 years experience. Need Senior level candidate who can spearhead AWS effort. AWS is new to company.
Experience working with AWS Analytical Component - Redshift.
Experience working with AWS GLUE - Managed ETL Service.
Experience optimizing data retrieval processes supporting API output and reading API calls.
Experience with performance tuning.

Education Qualification

Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology (IT), or closely related field.
